Message:
At any given moment,
stars that shine too brightly
will one day disturb the
harmony of the night sky.

Near the war’s end,
inside a hidden mine
in the South, we were on
a simple ambushing mission...
At least, that’s what we thought.

But, it wasn’t enemies
that surrounded us—
it was a touch-activated
magic circle...

A trap that reacts
to magical power,
meant only for killing witches.

If we were bathed in its light,
nothing would save us.

Do we run? Do we hide?
Neither was an option—
we had nothing to use for cover.

We were set up by those snakes
we thought were our allies—
the Northern government.

My second-in-command
pushes me aside,
and our surroundings
are engulfed in light...

That was the end
of the Witch Corps.
